text: Pabitra Niraula (or Pabitra Niraula; Nepali:पवित्रा निरैला खरेल) is a Nepalese politician and one of only six women MPS to be elected under the FPTP system in the 2017 Nepalese general election from Jhapa-2. == References == Category:Nepalese politicians Category:Living people Category:1964 births
title: Pabitra Niraula Kharel
